about_the_game:
Stones known as "Skill Gems" have fallen from the sky all over the world. Equipping these gems grants powerful attack abilities. People scramble to find Skill Gems to survive, and some even see them as a chance to dominate the world. The battle is about to begin!

  • Form a Battle Team: Command brave warriors, equip them with powerful Skill Gems, and make them unstoppable on the battlefield.

  • Flexible Strategy: Assign Skill Gems in a simple and intuitive way to plan skill deployment strategies.

  • Thrilling Combat: Take direct control of warriors in intense battles or delegate control to the AI and focus on tactical planning.

  • Level Challenges: Explore diverse levels, collect more Skill Gems, and take on increasingly powerful enemies, including formidable bosses.

  • Arena Mode: Compete against other players in fierce arenas where wisdom and strength collide, fighting for glory and generous rewards.
